name: Gotify
short_description: Self-hosted push notification service for sending and receiving notifications.
description: Self-hosted push notification service for sending and receiving notifications. Gotify is a self-hosted application focused on notification, tools, notifications, utility. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose.
usecases: Self-host Gotify on your home server to self-hosted push notification service for sending and receiving notifications without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use Gotify to manage your notification workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
